{{cpp/ranges/adjacent_transform_view/iterator/title|operator*}}
{{cpp/ranges/adjacent_transform_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr decltype(auto) operator*() const noexcept(/* see below */);
}}

Returns the current element in the {{tt|adjacent_transform_view}}.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|inner_}} be the data members of the {{rlp|iterator}}. Equivalent to:
{{source|1=
return apply([&amp;](const auto&amp;... iters) -&gt; decltype(auto)
             {
                 return invoke(*parent_-&gt;fun_, *iters...);
             },
             inner_.current_);
}}

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current element.

===Exceptions===
Let {{tti|Is}} be the pack {{tt|0, 1, ..., (N - 1)}}.
{{noexcept|std::invoke(*parent_-&gt;fun_, *std::get&lt;Is&gt;(inner_.current_)...)}}
